column4: hi guys, I booted from the current live iso and wanted to backup my /home that currently is stored on the root partition on a usb media. a sudo cp -a copies my whole home but it does not save the personal file rights. how can I copy them too?
it gaves me the output that it can not gain the owner
cp -a does keep privileges, unless your destionation is not ext3
if the target is not unix-capable, like ntfs, you will need to use archiving, like tar
